author: @todonoticias
title: Cu√°nto cuesta armar una computadora gamer en la Argentina | TN
text:
Ser gamer en Argentina no es f√°cil. Los precios de los componentes para armar una computadora se fueron a las nubes y las PC que sirven para jugar a los √∫ltimos videogames est√°n cada vez m√°s lejos del bolsillo de los argentinos.
Por estas razones, la pregunta que surge es: ¬øcu√°nto cuesta hoy armar una compu gamer , lista para jugar a las √∫ltimas novedades de la industria y los t√≠tulos m√°s exigentes?
Le√© tambi√©n: D√≠a del gamer: un estudio revel√≥ los beneficios de los videojuegos
Por la fuerte devaluaci√≥n del peso a principios de a√±o, la inflaci√≥n y consecuente la p√©rdida de poder adquisitivo , un equipo que tenga las caracter√≠sticas m√≠nimas necesarias para correr juegos pesados y con muchos requerimientos, es casi inalcanzable para la mayor√≠a de los bolsillos de los argentinos.
https://artear.arcpublishing.com/composer/edit/NVCTYXX43RDNVMHF7PG3K43CQI/. (Foto: AdobeStock) Incluso, varias computadoras y notebooks de marca se venden m√°s de 5 millones de pesos . Y los equipos m√°s potentes, cuestan m√°s de 10 millones de pesos.
Sin embargo, hay opciones m√°s econ√≥micas, para PC de escritorio, armadas a medida por especialistas y que se ‚Äúbancan‚Äù todo tipo de videojuegos .
A diferencia de hace unos meses, cuando al averiguar por una compu gamer la gente se sorprend√≠a por los valores, hoy los precios est√°n un poco m√°s estabilizados. Siguen siendo altos para la mayor√≠a, pero ya no sorprenden tanto . ‚ÄúHoy, la mayor√≠a de los clientes est√°n m√°s actualizados con los valores de los equipos‚Äù, explic√≥ a TN Tecno Maximiliano Borro, de Programax. Y agreg√≥: ‚ÄúHay menos consultas, pero m√°s compras porqu√© ya est√°n en tema y no hay tanta sorpresa con los precios‚Äù.
En cuando a los movimientos de precios, Borro aclar√≥: ‚ÄúEn la actualidad no es tanto, ni tan abrupto el cambio de valores de una semana a otra. Puede variar mes a mes, pero antes ten√≠amos que especular con los presupuestos de un viernes a un lunes. Ahora se mantienen los m√°rgenes un poco m√°s de tiempo‚Äù.
Le√© tambi√©n: D√≠a del gamer: qu√© significa hoy ser un fan de los videojuegos
A fin de agosto, y porque por el D√≠a de gamer muchos precios bajaron por promociones, hay equipos por menos de un mill√≥n de pesos. ‚ÄúSe trata de computadoras gamer iniciales, que se arman para c hicos que reci√©n empiezan a jugar ‚Äù, cont√≥ el especialista. ‚ÄúPor ejemplo, un equipo con procesador AMD RYZEN 3 3200G 4.0GHz Turbo + Radeon Vega 8 AM4 Wraith Stealth Cooler, con Mother Asrock B450M-HDV 4.0 AM4 HDMI M.2, 2x Memoria Kingston DDR4 8GB, con un Disco S√≥lido SSD Adata 480GB, fuente y gabinete, con componentes armado e instalaci√≥n est√° $990.839 ‚Äù, especific√≥ el experto.
Si el gamer es m√°s exigente , ah√≠ s√≠ el precio supera ampliamente el mill√≥n de pesos: ‚ÄúUna PC con placa de video para jugar calidad normal a alta se va a $1.700.00 ‚Ä≥, agreg√≥ Christian Borro, de la misma empresa de computaci√≥n ubicada en Villa Pueyrred√≥n. Y detall√≥ los componentes: ‚ÄúPor ese precio se arma una compu gamer con procesador AMD Ryzen 5 5600 4.4GHz Turbo + Wraith Stealth Cooler, Mother ASUS TUF B450M-PLUS II AM4, 2x Memoria Kingston DDR4 8GB, Placa de Video Zotac GeForce RTX 3060 12GB GDDR6 , con dos discos, uno S√≥lido SSD M.2 ADATA 500GB y otro r√≠gido WD 1TB, con fuente y gabinete.‚Äù
‚ÄúEste equipo podr√≠a ser ideal por bastante tiempo, y se podr√≠a potenciar con m√°s memoria RAM . Tiene una placa de video para jugar a media/alta calidad de la mayor√≠a de los √∫ltimos juegos, y muy buen espacio de almacenamiento‚Äù, explicaron ambos expertos. Y agregaron: ‚Äú Un equipo as√≠ de casi dos millones de pesos, no solo sirve para jugar, sino tambi√©n para trabajar con edici√≥n de im√°genes, renders , etc.‚Äù.
Le√© tambi√©n: Claves de gamers para convertirse en un profesional: estudiar, enfocarse en un juego y crear comunidad
No hay que olvidar que a estos equipos hay que agregarles un monitor compatible. Mientras m√°s Hz tenga el monitor mejor va a ser la experiencia visual: ‚ÄúLos Hz son una medida de la frecuencia de actualizaci√≥n de la pantalla, es decir, la cantidad de veces que la imagen se refresca por segundo, y en un equipo gamer esto es clave para juegos de multijugador, entre otros. No es esencial, pero es algo que lo vale para potenciar un equipo gamer‚Äù, aclar√≥ Maximiliano a TN Tecno.
¬øCu√°nto cuesta a fin de agosto de 2024 una computadora gamer profesional? Antes de seguir leyendo, record√° que una computadora gamer poderosa no es para cualquiera. Los precios de muchos de los componentes de este tipo de computadoras son importados y tienen precios en d√≥lares. As√≠, el valor final de estas PC puede elevarse hasta varios millones de pesos.
Las opciones son casi infinitas y tambi√©n se pueden conseguir equipos pro, pero por un par de millones menos. ‚ÄúUna computadora gamer profesional, con procesador AMD Ryzen 7 5800X 4.7GHz Turbo AM4, Mother ASUS ROG STRIX B550-F GAMING WIFI II, 2x Memoria Kingston DDR4 32GB, Placa de Video ASUS GeForce RTX 4090 24GB GDDR6X Gaming OG OC, dos discos s√≥lidos SSD M.2 ADATA 1TB, una fuente poderosa y gabinete premium, se va 5.500.000 peso s‚Äù, cont√≥ Maximiliano.
Le√© tambi√©n: Diccionario gamer: qu√© significan baitear, campear, nerfear y otros t√©rminos de videojuegos
‚ÄúHay que tener en cuenta que la placa de video sola vale $2.700.000‚Ä≥, aclar√≥ el experto. Y sugiri√≥: ‚ÄúSe puede bajar el precio final con una placa m√°s b√°sica, una ASUS TUF GeForce RTX 4070 Ti SUPER 16GB GDDR6X WHITE Gaming OC, que tiene un valor de $1.325.400 ‚Ä≥.
¬øCu√°nto cuesta hoy en Argentina una notebook gamer? Una Notebook gamer b√°sica de Lenovo, con una pantalla de 15,6‚Ä≥, procesador Ryzen 5, memoria de 8GB, disco s√≥lido SSD de 512GB, placa de video NVIDIA¬Æ GeForce¬Æ RTX‚Ñ¢ 3050 y Windows¬Æ 11 Home 64, cuesta 2.000.000 pesos.
Para presupuestos m√°s abultados, una notebook Asus Zenbook Pro 16X con pantalla t√°ctil OLED, procesador Intel Core i9 de 14 n√∫cleos, 32GB de RAM, disco s√≥lido de 1 TB, placa de video NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 60 Hz y Windows 11 Home, hoy cuesta en Argentina unos 6.000.000 pesos.
Por √∫ltimo, el especialista consultado comparti√≥ una opci√≥n m√°s econ√≥mica: ‚ÄúUn equipo port√°til ASUS con pantalla de 15.6‚Ä≥ y 165 Hz, procesador G-Sync i7-13620H RTX4070 16GB de RAM, disco s√≥lido de DDR5 1TB SSD NVMe RTX 3060 6GB GPU con Windows 11, hoy est√° aproximadamente 2.200.000 pesos. Y una Dell G16 7630 16‚Ä≥ QHD+ i9-13900HX RTX4070 32GB DDR5 1TB SSD Win11 llega a 3 millones de pesos ‚Äù, finaliz√≥ Maximiliano de Programax.

author: EP
title: Un ataque armado en Nigeria deja al menos trece muertos - Informaci√≥n
text:
EP
Madrid 23 AGO 2024 4:59 Actualizada 23 AGO 2024 6:16 Al menos trece personas han muerto en un ataque perpetrado por parte de hombres armados en la comunidad Anguwan Mai-Giro, que se encuentra entre las localidades de Rafi y Shiro, en el estado nigeriano de N√≠ger, en el centro del pa√≠s africano.
El ataque, que tuvo lugar el mi√©rcoles por la noche, ha sido condenado por el gobernador en funciones de N√≠ger, Yajubu Garba, quien ha descrito los hechos como "sat√°nicos, insensibles y atroces". "Es muy desalentador y perturbador que otros seres humanos lleven a cabo un acto tan b√°rbaro y cruel ", reza un comunicado. El gobernador ha reafirmado "la determinaci√≥n y compromiso inquebrantables" de "controlar la ola de inseguridad en el Estado", mientras que ha alentado a las fuerzas de seguridad a "no desanimarse por los ataques a las comunidades", asegur√°ndoles "todo el apoyo".
El noreste de Nigeria es el epicentro de las actividades de Boko Haram y su escisi√≥n, Estado Isl√°mico en √Åfrica Occidental (ISWA) , si bien la inseguridad se ha extendido a otras zonas del centro, el norte y el noroeste, haciendo saltar las alarmas sobre la posible expansi√≥n de estas redes terroristas y criminales.
TEMAS

author: CNN Newssource
title: Pope Francis' hospital treatment dealing with 'complex clinical' condition, Vatican says | KRDO
text:
12:04 PM By Christopher Lamb, Antonia Mortensen and Sharon Braithwaite, CNN
(CNN) ‚Äî Pope Francis has a ‚Äúpolymicrobial infection‚Äù of his respiratory tract that will require his hospital treatment to be changed , the Vatican said Monday, with tests indicating a ‚Äúcomplex clinical picture‚Äù for one of the oldest popes in the church‚Äôs history.
The test results implied a further change in treatment requiring ‚Äúadequate hospitalization‚Äù for the 88-year-old pontiff ‚Äì who has long been plagued by a string of lung-related medical struggles.
‚ÄúThe results of the tests carried out in recent days and today have demonstrated a polymicrobial infection of the respiratory tract that has led to a further change in therapy,‚Äù the Vatican said in a statement.
‚ÄúAll the tests carried out to date are indicative of a complex clinical picture that will require adequate hospitalization.‚Äù
Later on Monday, the Vatican confirmed the pope remained in a stable clinical condition ‚Äì without fever ‚Äì and is continuing his prescribed therapy.
‚ÄúThis morning, he received the Eucharist and subsequently dedicated himself to some work activities and reading texts,‚Äù a statement from the Vatican said.
The statement added that the pope was ‚Äútouched‚Äù by the messages of affection he continues to receive. ‚ÄúIn particular he intends to express his thanks to those who are currently hospitalized, for the affection and love that they express through the drawings and good wishes,‚Äù it said.
‚ÄúHe prays for them and asks that they pray for him,‚Äù it added.
Polymicrobial infections are acute and chronic diseases that can be caused by a combination of viruses, bacteria, fungi and parasites, according to the US National Insititutes of Health .
Worshipers outside the Vatican expressed concern over the pope‚Äôs diagnosis and wished him a steady recovery. ‚ÄúWe certainly wish for him to get better very quickly,‚Äù Rev. Tyler Carter, a US priest, told Reuters. ‚ÄúHe is our father and our shepherd, and so we want his continued health and blessing.‚Äù
Manuel Rossi, a visitor from Milan, northern Italy, said: ‚ÄúI am 18 years old so I have seen few popes in my life, and am very close to him.
‚ÄúI hope he recovers as soon as possible,‚Äù added Rossi.
‚ÄòHe is more tired‚Äô
Earlier Monday, Francis slept well, read some newspapers and ate breakfast, according to Vatican spokesperson, Matteo Bruni, after he tried to complete routine obligations on the first two days of hospitalization.
On Friday and Saturday, the pope spoke on the phone to Rev. Gabriel Romanelli and his assistant, Father Yusuf Asad, in Gaza City, northern Gaza ‚Äì who have been in frequent communication since Israel launched its war following the October 7 attacks.
After more than 15 months of ‚Äúmassacres, violence, fear, and hunger‚Äù in the Palestinian enclave, the pontiff called his colleagues ‚Äúto check in,‚Äù Vatican News reported on Monday .
‚ÄúWe heard his voice. It is true, he is more tired,‚Äù reflected Romanelli. ‚ÄúHe himself said, ‚ÄòI have to take care of myself.‚Äô But you could hear the clear voice, he listened to us well.‚Äù
The pope was checked into a hospital in Rome last week for ‚Äúdiagnostic tests‚Äù relating to a respiratory tract infection, the Vatican added. They later confirmed he was in Agostino Gemelli Polyclinic in the Italian capital ‚Äì and had canceled his meetings for the next three days, including his general audience scheduled Wednesday.
He did not lead the weekly Angelus prayer on Sunday ‚Äì only the second time that this has happened in his almost 12-year-long papacy.
Doctors had prescribed ‚Äúcomplete rest‚Äù for the pope, who had engaged in an intense round of meetings and public events until his hospitalization.
When he was younger, the Argentinian leader endured severe pneumonia and had part of one lung removed. More recently, he suffered two falls in recent months and has been seen using a wheelchair to help alleviate his restricted mobility.
Francis also has diverticulitis, a common condition that can cause the inflammation or infection of the colon. In 2021, he had surgery to remove part of his colon.
‚ÄúWe hope that the recovery will happen soon, and that he can return to St. Peter‚Äôs to continue his mission and work,‚Äù added Romanelli, the priest in Gaza City.
The-CNN-Wire
‚Ñ¢ & ¬© 2025 Cable News Network, Inc., a Warner Bros. Discovery Company. All rights reserved.
CNN‚Äôs Ben Tinker and Barbie Latza Nadeau contributed reporting.

author: Heather
title: Ariana Grande Wore Another Thing
text: Her style in the last several months has left me stone cold, and I think a HUGE part of it is whatever she‚Äôs doing with her hair and eyebrows, but there‚Äôs also a strange Living Doll thing she seems to play into and I don‚Äôt love it. It‚Äôs almost like being in arrested development or something. Also, she‚Äôs wearing a formal wedding chair cover; she‚Äôll be lucky if someone doesn‚Äôt try to hang a coat on her or tuck her under a table.

author: Agencia EFE
title: Daddy Yankee lanza tema cristiano este Viernes Santo - Primera Hora
text: Daddy Yankee lanza tema cristiano este Viernes Santo ‚ÄúDonante de Sangre‚Äù destaca la importancia de valores como la fe, la humildad y la gratitud. PUBLICIDAD El cantante puertorrique√±o Daddy Yankee anunci√≥ este jueves que lanzar√° la noche del Viernes Santo el tema ‚ÄòDonante de Sangre‚Äô para rendir homenaje a Jesucristo, tras su anuncio en diciembre de que dedicar√≠a su vida a Cristo. ‚ÄúYo fui sano por su sangre, libre camino por su sangre, soy diferente a lo que era antes‚Äù, menciona el apodado como ‚ÄòJefe del Reguet√≥n‚Äô o ‚ÄòThe Big Boss‚Äô, en una estrofa de la canci√≥n que se publicar√° a las 12:00 a.m. Donante de Sangre 3.29.2024 üíú‚Äî Daddy Yankee üíú (@daddy_yankee) [https://t.co/wT0FuziMxQ] [pic.twitter.com/FGPvO76pcD] [March 28, 2024] Yankee en este tema destaca la importancia de valores como la fe, la humildad y la gratitud, por encima del ego, la fama y el dinero. Relacionadas Raymond Ayala, nombre de pila del artista anunci√≥ en diciembre en Puerto Rico, al completar su quinto concierto ‚ÄòLa Meta‚Äô, con el que finaliz√≥ su carrera art√≠stica, que se acababa una historia e iba ‚Äúa comenzar una nueva historia, un nuevo comienzo‚Äù, el de vivir su vida para Cristo. De esta manera, Daddy Yankee se une a H√©ctor ‚ÄòEl Father‚Äô, Farruko, Voltio, Gocho, Jomar ‚ÄòEl Caballo Negro‚Äô, Larry Over y El Sica entre los varios artistas urbanos que han decidido dejar la m√∫sica y seguir el Evangelio. Yankee arranc√≥ su carrera musical a principios de la d√©cada de 1990 en el disco ‚ÄòPlayero 34‚Ä≤, del productor musical DJ Playero, y donde por primera vez el int√©rprete mencion√≥ la palabra reguet√≥n o reggaeton. Debido al talento que DJ Playero vio en el joven promesa, decidi√≥ ubicarlo en sus siguientes producciones, que le catapultaron en Puerto Rico, aunque su estrellato a nivel internacional lo logr√≥ en 2004 con el tema ‚ÄòGasolina‚Äô. Su √∫ltimo √°lbum, ‚ÄòLegendaddy‚Äô, que super√≥ los 600 millones de reproducciones en menos de un mes, cont√≥ con colaboraciones de artistas como Bad Bunny, Rauw Alejandro, Pitbull, Natti Natasha y Becky G.

author: Mike Taylor
title: CEO of the Year 2023 Finalist: Rich Benenson
text: CEO of the Year 2023 Finalist: Rich Benenson In 2022, under Rich Benenson's leadership, Brownstein Hyatt posted the highest revenue in the firm's history. Colorado is full of devoted entrepreneurs, business leaders and tech-savvy visionaries who are constantly taking the business world to new heights. It‚Äôs no secret that here, at ColoradoBiz, we love the Colorado business community. That‚Äôs why, every year, we spotlight the most impressive CEOs throughout our Centennial state and give credit where credit is due ‚Äî to the forward-thinking minds constantly chasing the next great idea and upholding their business practices to the most purposeful ideals. We‚Äôre proud to introduce our finalists for CoBiz‚Äôs prestigious 2022 CEO of the Year award. Rich Benenson Managing Partner Brownstein Hyatt Farber Schreck Denver, Colorado Website: [www.bhfs.com](https://www.bhfs.com/) Under Rich Benenson‚Äôs leadership in 2022, Brownstein Hyatt Farber Schreck saw an increase in revenue, growth in attorney and policy professional hiring, new comprehensive wellness and leadership development programs, and expansion of the firm‚Äôs DEI program. One of Benenson‚Äôs most notable challenges was moving the firm to Block 162, a new 30-story office tower in downtown Denver. The move was the culmination of three years of strategic planning that began in mid-2020. Benenson foresaw that Brownstein‚Äôs employees needed a fresh, hybrid office space, one that offered space for in-person collaboration, because a fully remote-working environment wasn‚Äôt a long-term solution for a firm that thrives on relationships in a team-oriented environment. Benenson joined Brownstein in 2002 as an associate in the litigation department and has had experience at almost every level of the firm and chaired almost every firm committee. This provides him with unique insight into the many perspectives of employees, allowing him to make informed decisions that serve everyone at Brownstein. In 2022, Brownstein posted the highest revenue in the firm‚Äôs history, and it was the No. 1 lobbying firm in Washington, D.C., for all of 2022 and the first two quarters of 2023. One of Benenson‚Äôs biggest challenges has been fully incorporating the thriving lobbying practice into a legal framework. As a lobbying practice headquartered outside of D.C. that only established a presence there 30 years ago, there is no other firm that is on the same trajectory to learn from. Benenson has successfully articulated a vision that aligns the firm‚Äôs legal and lobbying efforts to offer expanded services to clients. From strategic hires to expand Brownstein‚Äôs state government relations capabilities to encouraging a cross-selling mindset among all attorneys and policy advisors, there has never been more synergy between the law and lobbying practices. Attorneys and policy advisers are collaborating to better serve clients and provide innovative solutions. What started as an immense challenge when Benenson took on the role as managing partner has been harnessed into his greatest opportunity.

author: Anonym
title: The Main Intelligence Directorate of Ukraine stated that it is asking for the return of the bodies of prisoners killed in the Il-76 crash. - Teller Report
text: ‚ÄúUkraine has appealed and continues to appeal about the transfer of bodies,‚Äù he said. According to the Russian Ministry of Defense, on January 24, Ukrainian troops hit a Russian Il-76 military transport aircraft with captured Ukrainian Armed Forces military personnel over the Belgorod region using an anti-aircraft missile system. On board were six crew members, 65 military personnel of the Armed Forces of Ukraine for the exchange and three Russian military personnel accompanying them. They all died. The Investigative Committee found out that the anti-aircraft missile weapons from which the attack was carried out were located in the village of Liptsy, Kharkov region. During the investigation, it became known that the plane was shot down by the American Patriot system. In particular, the research helped to establish that traces of hexogen with impurities of up to 10% octogen were found in the washes from the found elements, which is typical for foreign-made explosives. The remains of the victims have already been identified, more than 670 fragments of bodies were found at the crash site, and partially preserved personal documents were also confiscated. As President Vladimir Putin emphasized, Russia insists on conducting an international investigation into what happened. At the same time, the Kremlin noted that Western countries refuse to take part in such an investigation because they are afraid of ‚Äúexposing themselves.‚Äù

author: WKRC
title: chevron-right
text: CINCINNATI (WKRC) - Is it Tee time? Bengals receiver Tee Higgins returned to practice on Thursday. The 25-year-old missed the first two games of the season with a hamstring injury, and he was a limited participant in the practice. He had not practiced at all since suffering the injury on Sept. 5, three days before the Bengals opened the season at home against the New England Patriots. He also did not participate in either of the first two games. "See where it goes from there," head coach Zac Taylor said ahead of practice. " We need him." The Bengals, who started the season with losses against the Patriots and at the Kansas City Chiefs, host the Washington Commanders for Monday Night Football. "He's a top player in this league," said Taylor of the possibility of getting Higgins back. "That makes every personnel grouping better when he's in it. Him and Ja'Marr (Chase), obviously two guys that draw a lot of attention singularly, so when we've got them on the field together, it's certainly good assets to have." Higgins is playing this season on the franchise tag that pays him a guaranteed $21.8 million after his agent and the Bengals couldn't come to terms on a contract extension. The Bengals used a significant amount of two tight end, two wide receiver alignments in last week's game against the Kansas City Chiefs, due in part to not having Higgins. The alignment worked so well that it may even continue when Higgins returns with him and Chase manning the two wide receiver spots. "I think having Tee on the field, I don't care what we're in, we're better," said offensive coordinator Dan Pitcher. "It helps getting him back, regardless of what personnel grouping we're in, certainly 12 with Ja'Marr Chase and Tee Higgins out there is pretty -- you know, I think it'll be a good grouping for us." Said quarterback Joe Burrow: "We‚Äôre obviously a better team with Tee out there. He‚Äôs going to continue to get healthier and healthier. Hopefully we have him on (Monday). If we don‚Äôt, we still feel confident in the guys that we have. We‚Äôre obviously more dynamic and a much better team with Tee out there." The Bengals are also dealing with several other injuries. Neither of the team's starting defensive tackles -- Sheldon Rankins and B.J. Hill -- participated in Thursday's practice as they are each dealing with a hamstring injury that knocked them out of the Kansas City game. "We'll just keep going day-to-day," Taylor said of their status. The good news at that position group is that rookie Kris Jenkins Jr. was a limited participant after missing the first two games due to a thumb injury leading up to the opener that required surgery. Rookie offensive tackle Amarius Mims, who missed the first two games due to a pectoral muscle injury, was also a limited participant. Veteran safety Vonn Bell (ribs) and veteran tight end Mike Gesicki (calf) were surprise limited participants in Thursday's practice. Tight end Tanner Hudson did not participate due to a knee injury.
